message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase my product for $13,000. I believe this price reflects the value it holds for you.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I can get from the product.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your perspective, but I can't go as low as $10,000. How about we meet in the middle at $11,500?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we try $11,000? I'm willing to compromise, but I need to stay within my budget.
